snippet: Ronaldo netted his 14th and 15th goals to set a record scoring start in a Spanish league season as Real Madrid eased to a 5-0 win at Levante.
abstract: Cristiano Ronaldo nets his 14th and 15th goals to set a record-scoring start in Spanish league season as Real Madrid eases to 5-0 win at Levante; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ronaldo netted his 14th and 15th goals to set a record scoring start in a Spanish league season as Real Madrid eased to a 5-0 win at Levante.

headline.main: Cristiano Ronaldo Sets Record in Real Madrid Win
